abstract: David Katz believes that his Web site, sportsfanlive.com, will compete well against established sports sites he views as stodgy and too congested for fans to wade through.
snippet: David Katz believes that his Web site, sportsfanlive.com, will compete well against established sports sites he views as stodgy and too congested for fans to wade through.
lead_paragraph: David Katz is heading into a Web site battle against Internet sports powerhouses like the ones run by ESPN, Yahoo, Fox Sports, Major League Baseball and AOL.

headline.main: New Web Site Aims to Be Facebook for Sports Fans
headline.print_headline: New Web Site Aims to Be Facebook for Sports Fans
